question: In which of the following places, the scene in which Krishna, Rukmini, and Sudama are shown together is found?
explanation: The representations of the epic stories of Rama and Krishna can be found in the Deogarh temple. We also find the legends of Krishna such as the transfer of Krishna to Gokula, etc. TheÂ scene in which Krishna, Rukmini, and Sudama are shown together can also be found at Deogarh.
